column2: Hi Customer Service One, I was referred to your shop by a friend who recently purchased a custom board and is very happy with the end product. I am in the market for a new 7 foot 5 inch Super Fish and was wondering what your wait times look like? I am going on a surf trip in 10 weeks that I'd love to have the board for it. I have the time to meet next week, to discuss design, but am very busy after that. Thank you for your help!

Hi Customer, I regret to inform you that we are currently not taking any new orders at this time. We have a large wait list that is currently in use that you must reach the top of before we are willing to take your deposit and give you a time frame for the board. If you would like to add your name to this list please respond in the affirmative. We expect a 6-8 week wait before being moved off the wait list. Sorry for the inconvenience and we hope to be able to make your dream board in the future. 
Best regards,
Customer Service One

Good afternoon Customer One,

We're very happy to hear your friend is enjoying his board!

I'm sorry to say we can't take any new orders right now. We are swamped :(
If you want, we should have time to meet when you are back from your trip and we can discuss design ideas then.

Thank you for contacting us Customer One,

I regret to inform you that due to the high volume of orders we are taking on at the moment, a custom job is not possible during the time frame you have specified. Unless you are willing to adjust your requirements, we will not be able to meet your demands.

Thank you for your interest but we can't help you. We simply cannot accommodate your timeframe; 10 weeks is far too short for a Super Fish and we currently have a month long wait time for consultations. Next time you should give yourself a minimum of 15 weeks.
As you can see on our website, we do not fill custom orders in less than 15 weeks. Please inquire when you have more time.

Great to hear that your friend is enjoying his/her board.  Regrettably, there is no way we can build a custom board within 10 days.  Even when we can fast track an order, we need a minimum of 20 days.  Try Suzie's Surf Shop.  They may be able to help you.   In the future, if your window is a bigger one, do contact us as we make the #1 rated boards on the island.
I do not have the time to meet with you within your timeframe. Next time plan for at least 15 weeks production time. All of this is clearly explained on our company website.

Dear customer, 10 weeks won't do. Next time make sure to review our website before contacting customer service. If you have a request that meets our production criteria please book a consultation with a member of our team.
